translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽. The Chapter with Kumuda as the Foremost
in it there was a demon,
the size of a wheel, was born;
But the Blessed One, the Seer of the Truth,
the Leader of Men, the Best of Men,
And when the Fully Enlightened One,
the God of Gods, the Best of Men, came,
I do not recall any bad destination,
this is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
From here, in the fifteenth eon,
for seven days, there were rulers of the people;
The six direct knowledges have been realized,
and the Buddha’s instruction has been done.”🔽Thus has it been heard by me:

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā kumudamāliyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā kumudamāliyaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: The Elder Kumudamāli recited these verses.
The first chapter of the Elders’ Verses is finished.
